Title: How The Elephant Got Its Trunk
Plot: After a bag is blown out the window of the Charity Shop Vinnie spots it on a country road and sets out in hot pursuit. Papa Lazarou returns and all the series' loose ends are tied up.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh
